name: Pengu Ice Smasher
description:
See how far you can make it down in the ice caves.  Press Enter on your number pad to start/restart the game.  Press down to break through the ice, you must dodge the Chickaboom's.  Also, be weary of the bombs under the ice, don't break through those, that's bad.

I am indecisive if I am going to continue this game after the jam or not, we'll just see how it does.
